metadata.title: CVE-2023-46103 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Sequence of processor instructions leads to unexpected behavior in Intel(R)Core(TM) Ultra Processors may allow an authenticated user to potentiallyenable denial of service via local access.

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'trusty doesn't support early microcode loading at runtime').
